attributes.action: request the Archbishop of Canterbury to resign forthwith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Archbishop has given up on his prime responsibility to Christ. He is failing to obey Christ's commission to take the Word to the Gentiles by becoming an apologist for another religion.  He is also promoting a law alien to Christianity and thus not looking after his flock.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
